page.title: 08POPULATION
page.content: The population of this D block is roughly 50'000. Over the ten years from 1971 to 1981 the population fell on average by 14.2%. This fall in population varies from 6.9% in St.Michael's Ward. These are two of the seven wards which lie in this block. A rough estimate of the social structure may be seen in the following table:- Social Class Block % Borough % I Professional 3.5 3.2 II Intermediate 16.2 17.3 IIIN Skilled Non_Man 9.7 11.1 IIIM Skilled Manual 44.1 43.9 IV Partly Skilled 17.2 17.2 V Unskilled 9.3 7.3 Population information obtained from Ward Profiles produced by Sunderland Programme Planning Department.
